text: Neuzhto tot, kto poklonyayetsya v chasy nochnyye, Prostershis' nits il' stoya (blagoveyno), Dlya zhizni budushchey sebya osteregayet (ot grekha) I chayan'ya svoi na Boga vozlagayet? Skazhi: "Uzhel' pred Bogom budut naravne: Kto znayet - s temi, kto nevedushch?" Lish' te, v kom razumeniye zhivet, Preduprezhdeniye siye priyemlyut
